data.text:
E2E test: Multiplayer join tests expect wrong game status

Tests expect status="waiting" but game now auto-transitions to "picking" phase.
Affected tests:
- "two players can see each other" 
- "four players can join the same game"

Suspects: tests/e2e/specs/multiplayer/join.test.ts
Path to trace: Update assertions to expect "picking" or add wait logic for the correct phase
